categories: Category:Sith Lords of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Dargous Tanmoul was a male Sith battlemaster, who served the Sith Empire. He became one of the three gatekeepers contained within the Tascollan holocron.

Tanmoul was very blunt and liked to describe in great detail how the Force could be used to defeat one's enemies. He hoped that his descriptions would anger people and so make them more susceptible to the Dark side of the Force. He could be insulting, but admired strength and brutality. His gatekeeper in the Tascollan holocron was dressed in dark-colored Sith armor and carried a large Sith sword.
